body: #[derive(Debug, Hash, Default, Clone, Copy, PartialEq, PartialOrd, Eq, Ord)]

Cargo: Package Name.description: Inserts a macro that evaluates to a &str of the name of the current Cargo package.

Cargo: Package Version.description: Inserts a macro that evaluates to a &str of the version of the current Cargo package.

Cargo: Package Description.description: Inserts a macro that evaluates to a &str of the description of the current Cargo package.
